resources: Movies The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring The Lord of the Rings 1 A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron. Directed by: Peter Jackson Time: 2h 58m Released: 2001 Elijah Wood [Frodo] Ian McKellen [Gandalf] Orlando Bloom [Legolas] Sean Bean [Boromir] Sean Astin [Sam] Sala Baker [Sauron] Billy Boyd [Pippin] Andy Serkis [Golum] Viggo Mortensen [Aragorn] Cate Blanchett [Galadriel] Ian Holm [Bilbo] Christopher Lee [Saruman] The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King Oppenheimer Cars Shrek 2 James Bond: Casino Royale After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.
